page.title: 01Eden Park Area, Brixham
page.content: In our square we found out that 61% of the area covered was houses, 34% was rough grazing, and 5% was deciduous woodland made up of oak, beech, sycamore and horse chestnut. The village of Galmpton is mainly made up of retired wealthy people and a few holiday homes, there are a few who commute to the STC factory and service industries. There is a C of E Primary School in the middle of the village. The village pub the 'Manor Inn' has a restaurant attached and people travel from miles around. It has a few shops to serve the locality.
